entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.

text: @realDonaldTrump Gov Cuomo is working hard to save  the people of New York! You could care less about the people in this country! You and your administration waited so long to prepare our country from Coronavirus. I think you call it Chinese virus because you struggle saying Coronavirus! Idiot!
